text:
Ms. Suat Chin Tee has been an excellent speech therapist with over 20 years of experience working with children.

In the beginning, it was difficult for my child to follow her classes, but she sought alternate ways to make the classes more engaging for my child to follow.

She also accommodated through online classes during an overseas job stint in the past year. When I returned to Singapore, I continued with physical class which my child has shown significant improvements in speech and pronunciation clarity.

I am grateful for her help and continues to work with her to achieve some milestones within the next few months.

Overall, I am satisfied with the progress for my child and strongly recommends to other parents seeking for speech therapy in Orchard, Central Singapore.

The clinic is conveniently located within walking distance to Dhoby Ghaut MRT (Circle Line, North-East Line & North-South Line).

Suat Chin has been a wonderful speech therapist. I have seen major change in my son‚Äôs speech in 6 months. From non verbal boy to being able to speak more words now.  She gives very clear and sharp lessons. I am thankful to find a suitable speech therapist like her üëçüèª

We were so lucky to find Little Chatterbox. Our son struggles with articulation, so when we moved to Singapore from the US we wanted to make sure to get him in speech therapy as soon as possible. Suat Tee Chin is firm and takes a no-nonsense approach that really capitalizes on the time they have together each week. We have noticed major improvements in the 6 months he has been attending.

Suat Chin is very professional and tailors the speech therapy sessions to my son who has made a lot of progress over the last 2 years. She is patient and firm which is key in making sure each session is productive. I deeply appreciate how she use different methods to help my son learn whether it is at her classroom or via zoom. Speech therapy is key in early childhood intervention and it takes a great teacher like Suat Chin to help the child grow.

Very thankful for Little Chatterbox! Suat Chin is an experienced speech therapist. Sharp clinically, clear lesson plans, and flexible, constantly adapting to the needs of the child. Builds good rapport with parent too. Highly recommend her for special needs children!
